title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Chris Mannix on Harden/Embiid, LeBron/Lakers Power Struggle, CLE Return, Westbrook Disaster, Zion Future
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Chris Mannix on Harden/Embiid, LeBron/Lakers Power Struggle, CLE Return, Westbrook Disaster, Zion Future
description:
First, Colin points out why the Nets and Lakers are failing to connect with their local markets, if a team can win a Super Bowl while paying Aaron Rodgers a historic $50 million per, and if Bucs Pro Bowl Guard Ali Marpet would have retired if Tom Brady come back for 2022.

Then, SI Senior NBA Writer - and host of Boxing with Chris Mannix - Chris Mannix and Colin discuss if the James Harden and Joel Embiid marriage will eventually implode (11:00), how the public power struggle between LeBron and the Lakers will end (23:00), if the Cavs would blow up their young roster to get LeBron back (27:00), which young Cavs player should be untouchable in a LeBron deal (32:00), why the Russell Westbrook/LA disaster is entirely unsurprising (35:00), why Westbrook's lack of improvement as a shooter is so puzzling (42:00), if Zion Williamson should reject a max deal to force his way out of New Orleans (46:00), If KD regrets his decision to team up with Kyrie (52:00), and why the Knicks have severely regressed after a promising first year under Tom Thibodeau (54:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
